title: LeaveBuster Warning problems
body: Last time, my laptops shutdown by accident so l cant get in the game. This time when l tried to log in there is leave buster warning problems popped out. l know it, its not big deal. But after l typed the "l Agree" the icon didnt light up, so l cant continue with anything!!! Someone helps me with thatï¼Œ thanks! l dont know how to post picture on ,if someone know l can post it on this site.

replies.body:
Are you on the updated client?  It's still in testing and the I Agree window there is fairly new.  If you're still having issues, try the legacy version to type I Agree.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if that helps!
l tried League client;lol.laucher.admin and lol.launcher already, none of them works.
Can you grab me a screenshot of what you're seeing?
l dont know how to post screenshot.... l am updating 7.5patch now. But everytime l download to some point it said"there is unspecified error occur." Do you know how to solve this too?
can u leave a email address so that l can send the pic to you

No worries!  Just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or send an email via support@riotgames.com.  This way we can take a closer look anyway and work with you individually to resolve it.  We'll reply back to your ticket as soon as we can!
l am trying to update the new patch
